items.title: I love getting emails telling me when there's somebody else's active access token in one of my commit SHAs. HF should really only tell you if it is your token, otherwise I could just make a dataset with a bunch of random strings and wait for a valid token.
items.content_text: I love getting emails telling me when there's somebody else's active access token in one of my commit SHAs. HF should really only tell you if it is your token, otherwise I could just make a dataset with a bunch of random strings and wait for a valid token. permission,token write,hf_. .. finegrained,hf_. .. ... , ... ... Also, don't comment about how unlikely this is. I've gotten a warning email about a token I 'leaked' at least four times. In all cases, it has been in the digest hash. See translation

items.title: Introducing AWQ and GPTQ quantized versions of SmolVLM from Hugging Face!
items.content_text: Introducing AWQ and GPTQ quantized versions of SmolVLM from Hugging Face! These models only had their text models quantized, and had a 50% model size reduction (4GB~2GB) while keeping model degradation under 1% on the DocVQA benchmark. #huggingface #smolvlm #smollm ronantakizawa/SmolVLM-Instruct-awq ronantakizawa/SmolVLM-Instruct-gptq See translation

items.title: The Secret to FREE, Local AI Image Generation is Finally Here
items.content_text: The Secret to FREE, Local AI Image Generation is Finally Here Tutorial video : https://youtu.be/c3gEoAyL2IE 🎨 Stop struggling with complex AI image generation! In this tutorial, I reveal the ultimate, one-click solution to creating stunning, photorealistic, and stylized AI art LOCALLY on your own computer—for FREE. Tired of confusing workflows, endless command lines, and expensive subscriptions? Forget everything you know about Stable Diffusion and ComfyUI's complexity. I'm introducing you to SwarmUI, the revolutionary tool that leverages the power of ComfyUI's backend with an incredibly simple, user-friendly interface. This isn't just another AI tutorial. This is a complete, all-in-one guide that takes you from ZERO to AI Art PRO in minutes. I provide a one-click installer that sets up everything you need, including pre-configured presets for achieving breathtaking realism and incredible stylization. 🔥 In This Video, You Will Discover: The Easiest AI Art Install Ever: A step-by-...

items.title: I'm excited to announce the release of Kanon 2 Embedder, the world's best legal
items.content_text: I'm excited to announce the release of Kanon 2 Embedder, the world's best legal embedding model, ranked first on the Massive Legal Embedding Benchmark 🎉 This model is the product of quite literally months of painstaking work alongside @ abdurrahmanbutler collecting, cleaning, and processing terabytes of data as well as coming up with novel improvements to the standard embedder training recipe to push the limits of what's possible. Kanon 2 Embedder is my most advanced model to date. On MLEB, it benchmarks as 9% more accurate than OpenAI's best embedding model and 30% faster. Even when truncated from 1,792 to 768 dimensions, Kanon 2 Embedder continues to hold the number one spot on MLEB. Importantly, Kanon 2 Embedder is also privacy and security friendly — unlike Voyage, Cohere and Jina, none of your data is used to train our models by default. Kanon 2 Embedder can also be self-hosted for enterprises with heightened security or reliability requirements. You can read the full...

items.title: How to Install and Use ComfyUI and SwarmUI on Massed Compute and RunPod Private Cloud GPU Services :
items.content_text: How to Install and Use ComfyUI and SwarmUI on Massed Compute and RunPod Private Cloud GPU Services : https://youtu.be/bBxgtVD3ek4 https://youtu.be/bBxgtVD3ek4 If your GPU is not strong enough to run Generative AI models this is the tutorial that you need. Or you want to scale your generation speed by using multiple GPUs at the same time again this is excellent tutorial. In this tutorial I will show how to setup ComfyUI and SwarmUI literally 1-click on Massed Compute and RunPod and use your most liked best image and video generation models like Qwen, FLUX, Wan 2.2 and more. 🚀 Unleash the full power of AI image and video generation on the cloud! This comprehensive tutorial is your step-by-step guide to installing and configuring SwarmUI and ComfyUI on two of the most popular cloud GPU platforms: Massed Compute and RunPod. Learn how to set up a powerful multi-GPU workflow to generate stunning, ultra-realistic images and videos at incredible speeds. We'll cover everything from deploying...

items.title: 🌾3LC Cotton Weed Detection Challenge 🌾
items.content_text: 🌾3LC Cotton Weed Detection Challenge 🌾 We’re excited to announce the launch of the 3LC Cotton Weed Detection Challenge—now live on Kaggle! Build a production-ready weed detector under real-world constraints: small models & imperfect labels—the conditions production AI teams face every day. Your mission • Detect & classify 3 weed species in cotton fields: Carpetweed, Morning Glory, Palmer Amaranth • Train with YOLOv8n @ 640 (fixed model size). Tune augmentation & hyperparameters, but no larger models, ensembles, or stacking allowed • Confront imperfect labels (missed weeds, class confusion, uneven boxes)—exactly what real teams face Prizes (USD $2,000 total) 🥇$1,000 • 🥈 $500• 🥉 $250 • 🎨 $250 Most Creative Solution (shareable across up to 5 teams) Plus: winner & participation certificates, LinkedIn shoutouts, and community recognition. What you’ll learn • Developing AI under strict resource constraints • Data-centric techniques to detect & correct label issues • Designing an iterative...

items.title: How Financial News Can Be Used to Train Good Financial Models 📰
items.content_text: How Financial News Can Be Used to Train Good Financial Models 📰 Numbers tell you what happened, but news tells you why. I’ve written an article explaining how news can be used to train AI models for sentiment analysis and better forecasting. Hope you find it interesting! Read it here: https://huggingface.co/blog/SelmaNajih001/llms-applied-to-finance I would love to read your opinions! I’m open to suggestions on how to improve the methodology and the training See translation
